notebooks.walkthrough.title: Get Started with Positron Notebook (Alpha)
notebooks.walkthrough.description: Welcome to Positron Notebook, a batteries-included editor for Jupyter notebooks
notebooks.walkthrough.step1.title: Enable the editor
notebooks.walkthrough.step1.description:
To use the Positron Notebook editor, you must explicitly enable it in your settings. This will activate the new batteries-included notebook experience with live variable inspection, built-in Data Explorer, and context-aware AI.
[Open Notebook Settings](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%5B%22positron.notebook.enabled%22%5D)
notebooks.walkthrough.step2.title: Open the demo notebook
notebooks.walkthrough.step2.description:
We've prepared a working example so you can see Positron Notebook in action immediately. Clone our demo repository and open the World Happiness Report notebook to explore the features.
[New Folder from Git](command:positron.workbench.action.newFolderFromGit)
notebooks.walkthrough.step3.title: Setup your Python environment
notebooks.walkthrough.step3.description:
Select an existing Python interpreter or create a new virtual environment with uv, venv, or conda. Your interpreter selection will appear in the top right corner of the notebook.
[Select Interpreter](command:workbench.action.language.runtime.selectSession)
notebooks.walkthrough.step4.title: Explore your data
notebooks.walkthrough.step4.description:
Run the demo notebook cells and watch the Variables pane populate automatically. Click the spreadsheet icon next to any dataframe to launch the Data Explorer with sorting, filtering, and summary statistics.
[Open Variables Pane](command:positronVariables.focus)
notebooks.walkthrough.step5.title: Try AI that understands notebooks
notebooks.walkthrough.step5.description:
Unlike general purpose AI, Positron Assistant understands which cells you've run, what variables exist in memory, and your execution history. Open the assistant to ask questions about your notebook.
[Open Positron Assistant](command:workbench.action.chat.openEditSession)
notebooks.walkthrough.step6.title: Shape the future
notebooks.walkthrough.step6.description:
We're releasing Positron Notebook in Alpha because we believe the best tools are built in collaboration with the community. Your feedback will help shape what comes next.
[View Roadmap](https://github.com/posit-dev/positron/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3A%22area%3A%20notebooks%22)
